input_text: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Rule><Name>Test Rule</Name><Condition field="field1" operator=">" value="42" /><Action field="field2" value="Submit" /></Rule>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Rule><Name>Rule 2</Name><Condition field="fieldA" operator="<" value="100" /><Action field="fieldB" value="Approve" /></Rule>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Rule><Name>Rule 3</Name><Condition field="fieldX" operator="=" value="5" /><Condition field="fieldY" operator="in" value="[1,2,3]" /><Action field="fieldZ" value="Reject" /></Rule>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Rule><Name>Age Check</Name><Condition field="age" operator=">" value="18" /><Action field="status" value="Eligible" /></Rule>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Rule><Name>Threshold Rule</Name><Condition field="threshold" operator=">" value="50" /><Action field="alert" value="Send Email" /></Rule>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Rule><Name>Discount Eligibility</Name><Condition field="spending" operator=">=" value="1000" /><Action field="discount" value="20%" /></Rule>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Rule><Name>VIP Membership</Name><Condition field="points" operator=">" value="100" /><Action field="membership" value="VIP" /></Rule>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Rule><Name>Risk Assessment</Name><Condition field="age" operator="<" value="25" /><Condition field="income" operator=">" value="5000" /><Action field="riskLevel" value="Low" /></Rule>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Rule><Name>Premium Check</Name><Condition field="premium" operator=">" value="2000" /><Action field="status" value="Premium Customer" /></Rule>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Rule><Name>Eligibility Check</Name><Condition field="age" operator=">" value="21" /><Condition field="income" operator=">" value="3000" /><Action field="status" value="Eligible for loan" /></Rule>
